Watch live the program's government statements from the House's channel: http://t.co/xFNKqvLETT #Greece
With the confidence and support of our people, we will build a financially independent, independent, dominant, equal partner in the EU
We have no commitments, but only one: To serve the interests of our people. To serve the national interest. #Greece
Our Irish Government's irrevocable decision is to honor & implement all of our pre-election program commitments #Greece
We are witnessing the return of hope, dignity and pride to Greek citizens. Obligation & duty not to disappoint them.
We will struggle to regain the founding principles and values ​​of the united Europe: Solidarity, Development & Democracy. #Greece
In the negotiation that has finally begun, Greece is making proposals. He does not receive orders. #Greece
There are not only technocrats in the deal. There is an important factor. The Greek people and the European peoples #Greece #mazi
We are not aiming to threaten any balance in Europe. On the contrary, we are the ones who want to restore balance. #Greece
Solidarity & equal co-operation of the Member States, the Treaties of the European Union. They do not write austerity & memoranda. #Greece
We do not negotiate our national sovereignty, popular sovereignty, the people's mandate. #Greece
Europe will not live again in the monster era. Do not fuel hatred among peoples. To understand understanding & solidarity.
Our first priority, from Wednesday morning, will be to address the humanitarian crisis in our homeland.
We are proceeding immediately to restore unconstitutional redundancy from the public sector, without burdening the state budget.
Implementation of the greater institutional reconstruction in the modern history of the country.
We are mandated to sell government cars that cost provocatively amounts over 700,000 euros.
The example of austerity must be initiated by the government itself. We are determined to impose a new style and power of authority.
Limit the staff of Maximos Maximos by 30% and reduce the Prime Minister's guard by 40%.
The government is ready to give at any cost the battle against high corruption, against the system of interweaving.
But also against tax evasion and tax evasion, which was the real cause that the country has reached the brink of a cliff.
We are immediately mobilizing the Criminal Investigative Corps to check the lists of high-ranking supporters
We set up an Internal Audit Service and we mobilize all relevant agencies and bodies to combat smuggling.
We adopt the most modern practices for identifying tax-free matter from triangular and intra-group transactions.
We immediately abrogate any unconstitutional provisions that give immunity to the CEFTA, the FSF and the Bank of Greece.
We are opening a MoU on a Memorandum of Understanding. Responsibilities will be assigned where they have to be repaid.
We guarantee the universal access of the Greek people to the good of objective and autonomous by political information interventions.
We re-establish by law ERT, on a zero basis.
The institutional reconstruction we are promoting has a central slogan: Democracy Everywhere. Memoranda undermined democracy itself.
We support and protect individual rights and civil liberties, the social rule of law. #Greece
The police will not have the role of suppressing mobilizations, but will guarantee protection from crime and the security of citizens.
With the new government for the first time in our country a simple Migration Directorate is transformed into a Ministry.
The primary objective of the new Portfolio is the immediate adoption of the Second Generation Citizenship Act.
We are committed to elaborating and adopting a stable, simple and fair tax system that will equally distribute burdens.
We abolish ENFIA from 2015 and replace it with a large real estate tax.
We are moving forward immediately to measures to regulate the arrears of debts to public and social security funds.
We immediately abolish the regulation that unconstitutionally transforms the offense of non-payment of debts towards the state into a permanent one.
We are determined to put an end to the policies that allow employers to be absent and to exploit the workers.
Discrimination and segregation at the expense of young people under the age of 25 that train the new generation of subordinate workers are ending.
Increase the minimum wage to 751 euros, gradually by 2016, to ensure a harmonious adjustment of the real economy.
These commitments constitute the framework within which the National Plan for Productive Reconstruction is to be launched.
We are promoting forms of social economy and cooperativity that will build a new pattern of economic activity.
We do not give up or sell out networks and infrastructure in the country that are national capital. We do not sell our natural & mineral wealth.
The new government brings with it a new understanding of the role of the welfare state. It attaches tremendous importance to its support and enlargement.
Government's first commitment: no age limits, no reduction of primary & supplementary pensions.
We are setting up a National Wealth and Social Security Fund to transfer revenue from the use of public property.
In the field of Education, our goals are equivalent. Equality, universal access, high level of education.
We pay particular attention to the promotion of Research with the appointment of a competent Deputy Minister.
Develop a plan to return thousands of young researchers currently working in foreign institutions to the country.
Recovering the dignity of the country and the people also requires an active, multidimensional foreign policy.
The historic obligation of the new government is the claim of the Housing Loan and the repairs.
The Greek people have put it on the stunning developments of the past few days, the last word and seal.
This people deserves only respect. He deserves to walk proud, he deserves to live in dignity.
Today's government can simply be the voice of this people. We can only be his will.
That is why we are not going to negotiate our history. That is why we will not negotiate the dignity of the people.
We are every word from the Constitution of this country. In this Constitution we swore, we will serve.

He has no qualms about the means to bring down the Likud government under my leadership, to close the day 'newspaper' Israel and regain control of the destructive "news" in the print media
These two stages and schedule slander initiatives ridiculous, false and biased against me and my wife as part of a media campaign to replace the rule of the leftist Likud government
There are many in the media who do their work faithfully Visitors to power in a purposeful manner even if the piercing. But Moses systematic smear campaign director of interests
